capability.name: Product Portfolio
capability.definition: Maintain a portfolio of analytical views of the product portfolio to support product profitability and performance analysis
capability.role: Maintain a portfolio of view of the bank's products with key product performance data and consolidated activity details to support profitability and performance analysis across the product portfolio
capability.example: Business development review product performance in order to target product design, marketing, sales, pricing and delivery priorities

key_features.name: Consolidate product performance data
key_features.description: Enables consolidate product performance data to support maintain a portfolio of analytical views of the product portfolio to support product profitability and performance analysis

key_features.name: Obtain comparative market research on competitor product activity/profitability
key_features.description: Enables obtain comparative market research on competitor product activity/profitability to support maintain a portfolio of analytical views of the product portfolio to support product profitability and performance analysis

key_features.name: Conduct analysis of product performance
key_features.description: Enables conduct analysis of product performance to support maintain a portfolio of analytical views of the product portfolio to support product profitability and performance analysis

key_features.name: Propose initiatives to improve product profitability/performance
key_features.description: Enables propose initiatives to improve product profitability/performance to support maintain a portfolio of analytical views of the product portfolio to support product profitability and performance analysis
